sentences.english: He reports for the China Times.
sentences.chinese: 他替中国时报采访新闻。

sentences.english: The chatter picked up some steam when The China Times reported a similar item.
sentences.chinese: 上面内容摘自中国时报相关话题的一些章节。

sentences.english: I get out own local newspaper the China Times .
sentences.chinese: 我会推荐我们的国内报纸《中国时报》。

sentences.english: All articles and pictures above are property of ChinaTimes and relevant owners.
sentences.chinese: 本图片与文字版权属于《中国时报》与其相关者所有。

sentences.english: We have China Daily , CAAC Journals, in-Flight magazines, and the local newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 中国时报，中国民航杂志和机内读物及当地报纸。
